name: IQ Marketing (Poland) Sp. z o.o.
description: We are one of the first and actually one of the biggest independent polish advertising agency, located in Warsaw, Poland. We have been operating in the polish market since 1996. We have wide experience in the key fields of marketing, ATL, BTL, digital, event and in many various branches. Our mission is to provide effective integrated marketing solutions in accordance to principles of corporate responsibility and the "win - win" strategy.
